%%{
  init: {
    'theme': 'base',
    'themeVariables': {
      'primaryColor': '#f0f0f0',
      'edgeLabelBackground': '#ffffff',
      'tertiaryColor': '#f4f4f4'
    }
  }
}%%
classDiagram
%% =========================================
%% SEMANTIC COLOR SYSTEM - Class Diagrams
%% =========================================

%% States
    class OperationalClass {
        <<operational>>
    }
    class WarningClass {
        <<warning>>
    }
    class ErrorClass {
        <<error>>
    }

%% =========================================
%% YOUR DIAGRAM HERE - Replace example below
%% =========================================

    class Document {
        <<entity>>
        +String id
        +String title
        +String content
        +Date createdAt
        +validate() bool
        +save() void
    }

    class PDFDocument {
        <<concrete>>
        +String pdfVersion
        +generatePDF() byte[]
    }

    class HTMLDocument {
        <<concrete>>
        +String cssTheme
        +generateHTML() string
    }

    class DocumentValidator {
        <<service>>
        +validate(Document) ValidationResult
        +sanitize(String) String
    }

    class ValidationResult {
<<value-object>>
+bool isValid
+String[] errors
+String[] warnings
}

%% Relationships
Document <|-- PDFDocument: inherits
Document <|-- HTMLDocument: inherits
Document ..> DocumentValidator: uses
DocumentValidator ..> ValidationResult: returns

%% =========================================
%% STEREOTYPES REFERENCE:
%% <<entity>> = Domain entity
%% <<concrete>> = Concrete implementation
%% <<service>> = Service/business logic
%% <<value-object>> = Value object (immutable)
%% <<interface>> = Interface/contract
%% <<abstract>> = Abstract class
%%
%% NOTE: Avoid reserved keywords in class names
%% See guides/mermaid/common-pitfalls.md
%% =========================================
